content.rendered:
Contact Us

Street/Mailing Address
Global Expansion of Krishna Community
727 5th Ave. S. #204
Minneapolis, MN 55415

GEOKC Hours
Weekdays: 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM
Weekends & Holidays: 9:30 AM to 1:30 PM and 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM

Contacts
Office: 612-540-9651

You may also send us an e-mail using the contact form below.

Fill out my online form.
